description._content: Gets a list of photo counts for the given date ranges for the calling user.

response._content:
<photocounts>
	<photocount count="4" fromdate="1093566950" todate="1093653350" /> 
	<photocount count="0" fromdate="1093653350" todate="1093739750" /> 
	<photocount count="0" fromdate="1093739750" todate="1093826150" /> 
	<photocount count="2" fromdate="1093826150" todate="1093912550" /> 
	<photocount count="0" fromdate="1093912550" todate="1093998950" /> 
	<photocount count="0" fromdate="1093998950" todate="1094085350" /> 
	<photocount count="0" fromdate="1094085350" todate="1094171750" /> 
</photocounts>

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: dates
argument._content: A comma delimited list of unix timestamps, denoting the periods to return counts for. They should be specified smallest first.

argument.name: taken_dates
argument._content: A comma delimited list of mysql datetimes, denoting the periods to return counts for. They should be specified smallest first.

error._content: Neither dates nor taken_dates were specified.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.

The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

error.message: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
